alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:45PM MDT until July 21 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 645 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Black Hawk, or 8 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hisega around 655 PM MDT. Rapid City around 705 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rockerville, Reptile Gardens, Bear Country, Hart Ranch, Black Gap and Hayward. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 54 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
